title: Why ignite is better on supports right now.
body: So as a support main, I've been taking ignite on most of my supports recently, even if there is not exhaust on the team, the reason? Warlords bloodlust. Warlords has become such an issue in lane becasue 20% lifesteal is massive. It's literally a bloodthirster worth of lifesteal, and it basically makes you unkillable early. most adcs take it, other than jhin and the occasional ez. there is a reason blodthirster existas adn was rushed first item. now with warlords, you can basicallt have a soraka in alne without having raka in the game. its so oppressive.

replies.body:
Why not have both

Flash is overrated
I mean, what lane shaco doesn't take ignite and exhaust. That shits op.
anyone who can lane shaco well is a fucking god in my eyes, that shit is so fun to watch.

80% of lane shaco's fail because they go flash ignite, ignite exhaust is where that shits at. It he can beat trundle, renekton and mundo he can beat anything, immobile thingos stuffed by boxes, bursty thingos stuffed by exhaust, durable thingos stuffed by ignite, everything stuffed by exhaust+ignite+box mayhem.

Ignite is almost always the better option for aggressive earlygame kill lanes that generally sport an engage support such as thresh or leona, exhaust is generally for more defensive lanes with shielding supports like soraka or janna. That said, if the support wants to carry, then ignite is definitely the better option, since it has alot more early pressure in lane. Ignite also tends to outperform exhaust if nobody ganks or tps down to botlane fights which can definitely happen in low elo. Exhaust only really shines in lategame teamfights , or as a supplementary form of cc, in botlane combos that lack any cc to help the jungler gank. With the current state of the game, earlygame matters alot more and hence ignite is generally better to take.

Other issues with exhaust is I see too many supports using it way too late. Exhaust should be popped during the initial discharge of all the damage cooldowns so that your adc can do more damage, and their adc(or mage sometimes) does less damage. Exhaust shouldn't be saved, it should be popped the moment, a trade turns into an all-in. This is another reason ignite generally outperforms exhaust.

You should also build full ap, let the adc build sightstone, and while you are at it, take all of their farm, cause it is not your job to give them as much gold as possible and give them every opportunity and advantage in every situatuation.
